79PA.SG.summary: Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides finance services in Thailand. The company offers hire purchase and loan, and non-performing assets management services. It also invests in other companies; and provides management and consulting services for retail credit systems in local and foreign country, as well as credit sale in foreign country. In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ACAP-R.BK.long_name: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited
ACAP-R.BK.summary: ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited provides corporate and retail lending services in Thailand and the Asian region. The company operates through Lending and Factoring, Call Center Services and Financial Businesses, and Others segments. It also provides non-performing loan servicing on behalf of client creditors, such as front end customer services to borrowers and carrying out day to day administration and accounting of the recovery process, loans accounts, and asset collateral, as well as NPL portfolio valuation services. In addition, the company offers legal advisory and representation services in the areas of business law, real estate law, civil law, bankruptcy law, tax law, and public sector relations; factoring services; and business process outsourcing services comprising call center, debt and receivables collection, loan approval, payroll, and data entry services. Further, it is involved in the sale of land with buildings and other real estate; and provision of investment banking services. The company was formerly known as ACAP Advisory Public Company Limited and changed its name to ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited in February 2016. ASIA Capital Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1998 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AE3.SG.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AE3.SG.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEONTS-R.BK.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AEONTS-R.BK.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AEONTS.BK.long_name: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited
AEONTS.BK.summary: AEON Thana Sinsap (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides various retail finance services in Thailand. The company operates through Retail Finance Services and Other Business segments. It offers credit card services, hire purchase services, personal loans, and other loans, as well as cash and installment loans. The company also provides debt collection services; and insurance brokerage services. As of February 29, 2020, it had 105 branches. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AF-R.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AF.BK.summary: AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited provides receivable factoring services to small and middle businesses in Thailand. It offers short-term financing services for various industries, including electronic equipment and parts, telecommunication, consumer products, and health and beauty. The company was formerly known as Dhanamitr Factoring PLC and changed its name to AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited in September 2011. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. AIRA Factoring Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of AIRA Capital Public Company Limited.

AMANAH.BK.summary: Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited provides hire purchase, financial and operating lease, and inventory finance services to consumers and corporates in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Hire Purchase and Others. It also offers used car, auto, and auto SME financing services, as well as auto to money services. As of June 30, 2020, the company operated 43 branches. The company was formerly known as Nava Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited in October 2010. Amanah Leasing Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASK-R.BK.long_name: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited
ASK-R.BK.summary: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited provides auto hire purchase services primarily in Thailand. It operates through five segments: Hire Purchase, Leasing, Loan, Factoring, and Insurance Broker. The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chailease Holding Company Limited.

ASK.BK.long_name: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited
ASK.BK.summary: Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited provides auto hire purchase services primarily in Thailand. It operates through five segments: Hire Purchase, Leasing, Loan, Factoring, and Insurance Broker. The company provides automobile hire purchase services for new and used automobiles, including passenger and commercial cars, such as pickup, van, truck and taxi, etc.; auto and machine leasing services for commercial customers; personal loans, sale and hire purchase back, and floor plan financing to hire purchase customers and automotive dealers; and factoring services to commercial customers in various industries. It also offers car, fire, marine, personal accident, and third party liability insurance to hire purchase and finance lease customers; and auto registrations and transfers, and tax renewal services. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Asia Sermkij Leasing Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Chailease Holding Company Limited.

CHAYO-R.BK.summary: Chayo Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in and manages non-performing loans. It also provides debt tracking and collection, personal loans, and call center services. The company was formerly known as Khien and Clay Company Limited and changed its name to Chayo Group Public Company Limited in December 2015. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CHAYO.BK.summary: Chayo Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, invests in and manages non-performing loans. ECL-R.BK.long_name: Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited
ECL-R.BK.summary: Eastern Commercial Leasing Public Company Limited provides credit services to personal and juristic person in the form of hire purchase, loans, and sale with right of redemption agreement in Thailand. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GCAP-R.BK.summary: G Capital Public Company Limited provides credit for the hire purchase of agricultural machinery, and personal and retail business loans in Thailand. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GCAP.BK.summary: G Capital Public Company Limited provides credit for the hire purchase of agricultural machinery, and personal and retail business loans in Thailand. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IFS-R.BK.summary: IFS Capital (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides factoring, hire purchase, leasing, and office rental services. The company offers factoring services for traders; manufacturers of electronics, packaging, automobile parts, plastic products, etc.; and providers of services, such as advertising agency, security guard, manpower supply, etc. It is also involved in the leasing and hire purchase of machinery, instruments, vehicles, and other equipment. In addition, the company offers confirming LC/TR, inventory financing, and contract financing services, as well as provides auto financing for passenger cars, pickups, trucks, and vans. Further, it offers block discounting services that consist of financing a trader's hire purchase, credit sale, and rental agreements. It operates in Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, and Thailand. IFS Capital (Thailand) Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JMT-R.BK.long_name: JMT Network Services Public Company Limited
JMT-R.BK.summary: JMT Network Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides debts tracking and collection services in Thailand. It is also involved in the purchase of non-performing accounts receivable for debts management and collection. In addition, the company offers asset management, non-life insurance, and personal loan services, as well as operates as an insurance broker. Further, it provides auto leasing services for used cars and second hand cars. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. JMT Network Services Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Jay Mart Public Company Limited.

JMT.BK.long_name: JMT Network Services Public Company Limited
JMT.BK.summary: JMT Network Services Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides debts tracking and collection services in Thailand. It is also involved in the purchase of non-performing accounts receivable for debts management and collection. In addition, the company offers asset management, non-life insurance, and personal loan services, as well as operates as an insurance broker. Further, it provides auto leasing services for used cars and second hand cars. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. JMT Network Services Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Jay Mart Public Company Limited.

KGTHY.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. It operates as a payment service provider, as well as offers utilities payment services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KRTA.F.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. It operates as a payment service provider, as well as offers utilities payment services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KTC-R.BK.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. It operates as a payment service provider, as well as offers utilities payment services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KTC.BK.summary: Krungthai Card Public Company Limited engages in the credit card, personal loan, and other related businesses in Thailand. It operates as a payment service provider, as well as offers utilities payment services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

LIT-R.BK.summary: Lease IT Public Company Limited provides financial services to small and medium enterprises in Thailand. It offers leasing, factoring, hire purchase, bid bond and e-bidding, project backup financing, trade finance, letters of credit, and supplier finance programs, as well as other loans. The company also provides data information and credit analysis services, as well as credit project management, including contract document, debt follow-up, and other services related to the credit process. Lease IT Public Company Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MIDA-R.BK.summary: Mida Assets Public Company Limited engages in the sale and hire-purchase of electronic home appliances, motorcycles, and used cars in Thailand. The company also develops real estate properties; operates hotels; rents golf courses; and provides real estate agency services. In addition, it offers advertising, billboard rental, and advertising sale services; public relation and events organizing services; financial services for used cars; and security guard services. Further, the company is involved in asset management; the management of hotels, resorts, commercial buildings, condominiums, villages, and spas; and the provision of health massage. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a network of 98 branches. The company was formerly known as Nakornpathom Mida 1991 and changed its name to Mida Assets Public Company Limited in 1997. Mida Assets Public Company Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

ML-R.BK.summary: Mida Leasing Public Company Limited provides financial services for used cars hire-purchasing and management of non-performing assets in Thailand. The company, through its subsidiary, Mida Asset Management Company Limited, also engages in asset management from transferred non-performing asset of financial institutions. It also provides other financial services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 17 branches in Bangkok and other provinces. Mida Leasing Public Company Limited is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MTC-R.BK.summary: Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited provides various lending services in Thailand. The company offers loans that are secured against vehicle registrations, land title deeds loans, condominium loans, and Nano finance, as well as personal loans without collateral. It also provides car, motorcycles, and agricultural truck loans. In addition, the company offers insurance brokerage services. As of December 31, 2019, it had 4,107 branches and service centers. The company was formerly known as Muangthai Leasing Public Company Limited and changed its name to Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited in April 2018. Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MTC.BK.summary: Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited provides various lending services in Thailand. Muangthai Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

NCAP-R.BK.summary: Next Capital Public Company Limited provides motorcycle hire purchase loans primarily to small customers in Thailand. The company also provides second hand car hire purchase services; services in connection with the provision of credit services as an additional service to customers, including motorcycle registration services with the Department of Land Transport; and coordination services for insurance, including the right transfer. It serves direct customers and motorcycle dealers. The company was formerly known as Buff (Thailand) Company Limited. Next Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

It serves direct customers and motorcycle dealers. The company was formerly known as Buff (Thailand) Company Limited. SAK-R.BK.summary: Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited provides financial services. It offers personal loans, secured loans, nano finance under supervision, and hire purchase loans. As of December 31, 2019, it operates 441 branches and service centers. Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited is incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Uttaradit, Thailand.

In addition, it provides digital personal loan services. The company was formerly known as Srisawad Power 1979 Public Company Limited and changed its name to Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited in July 2017. Srisawad Corporation Public Company Limited is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGF-R.BK.summary: SGF Capital Public Company Limited provides factoring, loans, personal loans, and leasing services in Thailand. The company operates through Purchase of Account Receivable, Leasing and Hire Purchase, and Loan segments. It provides automobile and motorcycle hire purchase loans; personal loan against vehicle registration as collateral; long and short term loan; personal loan; and Nano finance. The company also offers financial advice and legal counsel services, as well as purchase or transfer of loan receivables. In addition, it provides services related to building and place. The company was formerly known as Siam General Factoring Public Company Limited and changed its name to SGF Capital Public Company Limited in May 2017. SGF Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SGF.BK.summary: SGF Capital Public Company Limited provides factoring, loans, personal loans, and leasing services in Thailand. The company operates through Purchase of Account Receivable, Leasing and Hire Purchase, and Loan segments. It provides automobile and motorcycle hire purchase loans; personal loan against vehicle registration as collateral; long and short term loan; personal loan; and Nano finance. The company also offers financial advice and legal counsel services, as well as purchase or transfer of loan receivables. In addition, it provides services related to building and place. The company was formerly known as Siam General Factoring Public Company Limited and changed its name to SGF Capital Public Company Limited in May 2017. SGF Capital Public Company Limited was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

THANI-R.BK.summary: Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, provides hire-purchase and leasing services in Thailand. It operates through three segments: New Car, Used Car, and Others. The company provides super car, car, bike, truck, and taxi loans, as well as other loans. It also provides insurance brokerage services. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Thanachart SPV1 Co., Ltd.

TK-R.BK.summary: Thitikorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides motorcycle and automobile hire-purchase, and other related services for general retail customers in Thailand. The company also offers loan and nano finance services, as well as vehicle modification services. Thitikorn Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TK.BK.summary: Thitikorn Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides motorcycle and automobile hire-purchase, and other related services for general retail customers in Thailand.
